name: Payday 2: The Shadow Raid Heist
summary: The Shadow Raid Heist is the fourth free heist update to PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to take a new contract from Bain and Gage called the Shadow Raid job. A stealth only heist, it includes a free mask, the “Somen Mempo” mask, as well as 6 new achievements. This heist was a part of update 29 and is completely free for our players.
